programme.title: Miks mitte?
programme.desc: Sihikindel Anna otsustab osaleda räpikonkursil. Selleks on aga vaja korralikku räpivideot! Ehk saab teda aidata klassi teine nohik ja kiusualune Vadim? Aga mida hakata peale pere majanduskriisiga? Tundub, et Anna nigel palgake on hetkel peres ainuke sissetulek. Stsenarist Martin Algus, režissöör Ergo Kuld.(n)

programme.title: Euroopa kuulsamad raudteejaamad
Milan
programme.desc: Milano keskraudteejaam seisab nagu kalju keset Põhja-Itaalia metropoli. Jaama ehitamine, mis kestis 25 aastat, algas kuningriigi ajal ja lõppes Mussolini ajal. Milano Centrale jutustab lugusid rongifanaatikutest, moeuuendajatest ja juugendstiili austajatest, monumentaalsetest kalmistutest ning suurejoonelistest kasiinodest ja ka avalikust kümblusasutusest, kus reisijad said ennast pärast pikka rongireisi pesta ning värskendada.(n)

programme.title: Osooni loomalood
programme.desc: Mäger on ööloom, kes tuleb oma urust välja pimeduse saabudes. Oma tugevate esikäppadega rajavad mägrad pikki maa-aluseid käikude süsteeme, millel võib olla mitukümmend ava. Sageli elab ühes mägralinnakus mitu pesakonda, kes asustavad seda põlvest põlve. Autor-operaator Tarmo Mikussaar.(n)

programme.title: ehh, uhhuduur
programme.desc: Lõuna-Ameerikas süüakse liha. Palju. Sööb uhhuduurgi. Köögis on aga nagu laevas - kaks kaptenit ei pruugi ära mahtuda. Eks näis, kuis seekord läheb. Lisaks kombinatsioon miljonitest inimestest ja miljonitest tonnidest veest kulgemas oma vääramatut kulgu, kõhuvalust ning ööst bordellis. Ott Tänak on siinkandis tuntud mees. Režissöör Wend, operaator Liivo Niglas, tootja MTÜ Filmiklubi MP Doc.(n)

programme.title: Kultuuristuudio. Arutelu
programme.desc: Sari keskendub päevakajalistele kultuuriteemadele. Muredele otsime lahendusi, rõõmudele elame kaasa. „Kultuuristuudios“ kohtuvad teoreetikud ja praktikud, kes esitavad küsimusi ja annavad vastuseid. Saatejuhid Maarja Vaino, Tarmo Tiisler ja Kaupo Meiel. Režissöör Ülle Õun.(n)

programme.title: Ülakorruse rahvas
Sentimental
programme.desc: R: Cesc Gay. Kammerlik draamakomöödia. Ana (Griselda Siciliani) ja (Julio (Javier Cámara) on kõbusas keskeas, pealtnäha ideaalne paar. Nende kena fasaad varjab aga päevast päeva kestvaid tuliseid vaidlusi. Ühel päeval kutsub Ana õhtusöögile naabrid, kes pealtnäha samuti igati ontlikud, ja nüüd saab erimeelsuste klaarimine juba kollektiivse hoo. Selgub, et ka naabrid pole nii kenad kui paistavad ja ühine veini mekkimine kasvab omavaheliste suhete virrvarriks, kus suurem osa muremõtetest ikka seksuaaleluga seotud. Euroopa filmiauhinna nominent (2021) parima komöödia kategoorias.(n)

programme.title: Ender's Game
programme.desc: Seventy years after a horrific war with aliens, an exceptionally gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for the future invasion.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Born to a human father and an Atlantean mother, Arthur Curry is forced to step into his role as heir to Atlantis to prevent war from breaking out between the two worlds he belongs to.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: After his restored faith in humanity and his inspiration by Superman’s neglection to himself, Batman unites with Princess Diana to defeat the strong villain.

programme.title: Ender's Game

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: After meeting the parents of his girlfriend, male nurse Greg Focker invite the Byrnes to meet his parents. As different as it can be from the conservative family of the ex-CIA agent Jack Byrnes, the Fockers host their daughter-in-law's family and all hell breaks loose.

programme.title: Little Fockers
programme.desc: After Pam and husband Greg have twins, Greg faces a new challenge with his father-in-law, Jack. Greg must prove to the skeptical Jack that he's fully capable as the man of the house. But with all the misunderstandings, spying, and covert missions, will Greg pass Jack's final test and become inside the circle of trust ?

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: A couple’s world turns upside down when they foster three children.

programme.title: Night School
programme.desc: A group of troublemakers are forced to attend night school in hope that they'll pass the GED exam to finish high school.

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: A hard-working small business owner and his two associates travel to Europe to close the most important deal of their lives. But what began as a routine business trip goes off the rails in every imaginable and unimaginable way.

programme.title: Mortal Engines
programme.desc: After the 60-minute war, the survived cities thrive to stay on the now unfertile Earth. The strong survivors then decide to go to the smaller ones using huge bikes to take their resources.

programme.title: Night School

programme.title: Glass
programme.desc: Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities. They both meet Mr. Glass who's masterminding a grand plan.

programme.title: Instant Family
programme.desc: A couple’s world turns upside down when they foster three children.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: Continuing Bridget Jones' diary, her exciting adventures and the different stories we have experienced in the previous two parts, in this part we experience her surpassing forty years and devoting herself to the life of celibacy, but she discovers that she is pregnant at the same time, she is not sure who is the father of the child she holds in her guts.

programme.title: 127 Hours
programme.desc: The biography of Aron Ralston, a mountain climber, and his painful experience when he got trapped under a boulder, putting him in a situation that demands sacrifice in order to survive.

programme.title: Room
programme.desc: The film tells the story of Jack (Tremblay), a boy at the age of 5 years, who lives in his mother's love and sincere care (Larsson) which is developed in unusual circumstances, where the two of them are trapped in a place does not exceed an area of only a few meters, which refers by his mother to the word (The Room), where Jack's mother has created a parallel universe inside it, but curiosity began to grow inside (Jack) about everything surrounding him, whereupon he develops a risky plan to escape this universe.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A group of famous illusionists called the "Four Horsemen" are being chased by an FBI agent and an Interpol detective after they pull off major bank heists during their performances and shower the audience with money.

programme.title: Now You See Me 2
programme.desc: In the world of magic and optical illusions, the Four Horsemen face a tech genius who tries to exploit them, and they must clear their names before society and reveal the truth through one last stunt.

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In the town of Derry, kids are disappearing one by one, leaving behind bloody traces. Eventually seven kids that are united by their hate to a clown that has affected them all, and the will to kill him, It meet again years later seeking revenge.(n)

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: When Keller Dover's (Hugh Jackman) daughter and her boyfriend go missing, the police start searching for leads to find her, but when they fail due to lack of evidence, Dover takes matters into his own hands.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: Getting repeatedly reincarnated, a dog comes to an understanding about what he is meant to do in the world as he interacts with various owners over multiple lifetimes.

programme.title: Dolphin Tale
programme.desc: The film revolves around a friendship between a young child and "Telly" a dolphin that loses his tail in a crab trap. He got rescued and transferred to a Navy hospital in Pklerooter. There the child helps him to get back to water even without his tail.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and her brother Edmund move to the magical world of Narnia, with their cousin Eustace, on board of a the ship of Prince Caspian The Dawn Treader. During their journey they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors , until they reach the edge of the world.

programme.title: Europa Report
programme.desc: A Sci-fi ,adventure about a global team of astronauts going on a privately funded mission to Europa to search for life on Jupiter's biggest moon, but many unexpected surprises await them on this strange and wondrous moon.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A Young woman suffered a car accident, awakes to find herself in the basement of a house with a stranger man, who tells her he saved her life after several chemical attacks struck the areas and left all the city's houses uninhabitable. She doubted his words and decides to escape from the basement and discover the truth by herself.

programme.title: Edge of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Major William Cage finds himself thrown into a time loop-forcing him to fight aliens in the same brutal battle over and over, and together with Special Forces warrior Rita Vrataski they must find a way to defeat them.

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In the wake of a deadly martian storm, a space crew leaves one of their own behind, mistakenly believing him to be dead, only it turns out the astronaut is still alive. With little resources and limited supplies, he struggles to find means of survival and let those on Earth know of his presence.

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: In a world ravaged by natural disasters and climate change, mankind faces one more threat in the form of robots violating their protocols against altering themselves, which could spell disaster for the survival of mankind as machines evolve beyond what they were meant for.

programme.title: Cooties
programme.desc: A contaminated chicken nugget causes a zombie virus to spread across an elementary school. A group of misfit teachers is forced to fight for their lives as the school gets run over by zombified children.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Set in the time of World War II, a secret language called Navajo is used between members of the U.S. Army, that the Japanese are unable to decipher.

programme.title: AVP: Alien vs. Predator
programme.desc: An archaeological team head to Antarctica to investigate an ancient pyramid, only to find themselves caught in the middle of a brutal battle between two warring alien species.

programme.title: Welcome to Sudden Death
programme.desc: As he accompanies his kids to a basketball match, Jesse, the security guard who was once a special forces officer, is in a predicament when he finds out about a group of technophile extremists who are holding a coach and his daughter captive inside the arena.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: After Mr. X steals DM85, a deadly biological weapon, and its antidote, he arranges to sell it to billionaire, Liam Wonder. During their meeting, extreme sports player, Zhao Feng, accidentally parachutes into Bruce and the four rookies room and gets involved with them.

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: Princess Pei Pei is kidnapped from the Forbidden City, and Chon Wang decides to join the guards to rescue the princess. He teams up with a train robber, and they start a series of adventures together.

programme.title: The Maze Runner
programme.desc: When Thomas wakes up in the lift, the only thing he can remember is his first name. When the lift's doors open, Thomas finds himself surrounded by kids who welcome him to the Glade, a large maze enclosed by stone walls, and just like Thomas, the Gladers don't know why or how they got to the Glade, and they all must escape the deadly-creatures-infested place.

programme.title: Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and his fellow Gladers try to regain their lives again after escaping from the maze, but find that life outside the maze is a desolate waste land full of blood-thirsty zombies. At the same time they're trying to find clues to guide them to the organization behind the maze.

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: Upon discovering his baby photo on a website for missing persons, Nathan discovers that the father and mother he has been living with throughout his youth are not his real parents. He sets out to uncover the truth about his life.

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Chon Wang is the sheriff of Carson City, Nevada, and his father is the Keeper of the Imperial Seal of China. When his father is murdered, Chon asks his friend Roy to go to London with him, with revenge on their minds.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: In a force of undead police officers, the Rest in Peace Department, a young slain cop (Ryan Reynolds) teams up with veteran sheriff (Jeff Bridges) to protect the living from roving, monstrous spirits who have not yet crossed over.

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Michael is an engineer, who has his memory erased after completing each job. When the wealthy James Rithrick offers him a multiple-year contract, with the same conditions, he realizes that erasing his memory has erased crucial details of the work assignment.

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves’ directorial debut centers on the spiritual journey of a talented young martial artist whose skills draw him into the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the near future, a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes. Captain John Anderton, an officer from that unit, is himself accused of a future murder that will happen in the next 36 hours. What makes the situation worse, is that Anderton doesn't even know the victim.

programme.title: Edge of Darkness
programme.desc: Detective Thomas Craven is investigating the murder of his activist daughter. He not only exposes sensitive aspects of her secret life, but also clashes with crime organizations that try to erase any thread that may link her to them.

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: A story of how siblings go too far to save one another as a retired master car thief is forced to get back to the industry and reassemble his gang for one dangerous mission, facing an old rivalry with a group of thieves as well as the local police, just to save his brother.

programme.title: Abduction

programme.title: Man of Tai Chi
programme.desc: Keanu Reeves’ directorial debut centers on the spiritual journey of a talented young martial artist whose skills draw him into the world of underground fight clubs.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: The Decepticons' leader is looking for a miraculous super stone that gives its holder supernatural strength. The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Sam's intention to leave the Autobots behind in pursuit of a normal life is thwarted as an old Decepticon known as The Fallen rises, forcing Sam and his girlfriend Mikaela to delve into the history of the Transformers on Earth to find a way to defeat The Fallen.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: The L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team (S.W.A.T.) is charged with securing and escorting criminal Alex Montell, who is a foreign mafia leader wanted by the Interpol. Alex is offering a $ 100 million reward for anyone who can break him out of police custody.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: Empire State
programme.desc: Based on true events, Chris Potatmitis settles for a security guard job at the Empire State Armored Truck Company after he disqualifies at the Police Academy. He mentions their faulty processes to his best friend, Eddie, and unexpectedly becomes part of an eleven million dollar heist. The police, and local crime bosses who are angered by their unapproved work in their turf, are now after them.

programme.title: Chaos
programme.desc: Two cops partner up in order to uncover how a group of bank robbers managed to escape from a bank during a heist that apparently has other motives than just stealing money.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: During the time of the Roman empire, Emperor Marcus Aurelius decides that his heir will be General Maximus. However, his son, Commodus, murders him before he has a chance to act on his decision, and he becomes the Emperor after his father. Commodus then decides that Maximus must be killed, who in a turn of events, becomes a gladiator and a hero in people's eyes.

programme.title: Monstrum
programme.desc: Yoon Gyeom finds himself facing many people trying to get rid of King Jung Jong, while a ferocious monster attacks the kingdom of Joseon.

programme.title: Transformers

The only one able to get to the stone is Sam, a college student, and his friend Mikaela. Will he be able to save the world before the stone falls into the hands of the Decepticons.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: After being imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit, a street racer joins a cross-country race with a plan for revenge. When his ex-partner learns of his intentions, he places a bounty on his head as the race starts.(n)

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79 A.D., a slave turned gladiator races against time to save his beloved from marrying a corrupt Roman Senator, as Mount Vesuvius erupts in the Roman city of Pompeii.(n)

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.(n)

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: Sixty-five million years ago, an alien race, the "Creators", implanted an alloy, "Transformium", into the Earth. It is now excavated, along with the melted bodies of illegally hunted Autobots and Decepticons, by KSI industries to build transformer drones, like Galvatron. Optimus Prime, long in hiding from this hunt, emerges to defend his friends and face Galvatron who turns out to be an old enemy.(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: An unwitting American tourist named Frank finds himself in the midst of an intense pursuit that involves various European police forces and a gang of Belarusians among other parties. A seemingly minor error causes Frank to be mistaken for a man wanted by law authorities and mafia men alike.(n)

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: The film traces the emergence of Batman, as he travels to the Far East to study martial arts. He soon discovers about the League of Shadows, whose purpose is to eradicate the crime-ridden city of Gotham as it plunges into wickedness. Batman then starts his quest to combat corruption.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: When he returns from the war to find that the corrupt Sheriff of Nottingham has seized his land, Robin of Loxley comes to realize the extent of the corruption underlying England's Crusades, leaving him to join forces with his best friend and an Arabian warrior to challenge the English crown.(n)

programme.title: Hell on the Border
programme.desc: The true story of how Bass Reeves beat the odds and a racist community to become the first black deputy marshal west of the Mississippi River, with a career that made history as he distinguished himself in facing off against the outlaws.(n)

programme.title: 16 Blocks
programme.desc: Detective Jack Mosley, who is an alcoholic, is assigned a last minute mission after a hard day's work. The mission is to escort a witness 16 blocks from the police station to the courthouse, but he discovers that several people want the witness dead, and Jack is faced with an unlikely situation where he has to choose between his duty and his loyalty to his police officer colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.(n)

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: When the gorilla that was once Primatologist Davis Okoye’s friend is affected by an experiment that turns him into a ruthless monster that evades North America destroying everything in his path, Okoye works with a discredited genetic engineer to find an antidote to save the world and his former friend.

programme.title: Reprisal
programme.desc: In the wake of his coworker's death during a bank heist, a bank manager, Jacob, enlists the help of his neighbor, an ex-cop called James, to locate the perpetrator of the crime, only for the perpetrator to raise the stakes when he kidnaps Jacob's wife and daughter.

programme.desc: Inspired by his ex-wife's memoirs, events revolve around the stunning story of the life and achievements of the inspiring physicist Stephen Hawking, despite his motor neurone disease, with a special focus on his relationship with his ex-wife, Jane Wilde.

programme.title: Logan Lucky
programme.desc: Two siblings try as hard as they can to steal a car at a big Nascar race in South Carolina.

programme.title: Cinderella Man
programme.desc: The true story of boxer James Braddock, who was a boxing champion in the 1930s until he began to suffer injuries and broke his left hand and became poor in a period where only the rich survive, how will he support himself, wife and three children with a broken hand in the winter.

programme.title: Nicholas Nickleby
programme.desc: In the wake of his father's death, an ambitious young man tries to save his family and friends from his exploitative and self-serving uncle.

programme.desc: Sent for a loathed assignment in the town of Punxsutawney, a self-centered weatherman finds himself stuck in a time loop as he relives the town's annual Groundhog Day festivities over and over again.

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Wigand, an official at one of the largest tobacco companies, is faced with tough choices, either revealing dangerous secrets of the Tobacco industry through the TV program "60 Minutes", threatening to jeopardize his health insurance and family conditions, or to remain silent and violating his conscience.

programme.title: Amos & Andrew
programme.desc: When wealthy black author Andrew is mistaken for a burglar in his own vacation house, the local police chief recruits petty crook Amos to help with the cover-up. But soon Andrew and Amos become targeted by the police, and they have to work together to make it out alive.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: A story about family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on the early days of oil exploration in the early twentieth century through Daniel Plainview, a businessman who takes a great opportunity that will change his life.

programme.title: Mr. Wonderful
programme.desc: The electrician Gus dreams of having his own bowling-alley, but he can't pay the down payment because of the alimony payments he makes to his ex-wife Leonora. He decides to find potential suitors for her, so that she can get married and he stops paying alimony.

programme.title: King of California
programme.desc: When Charlie comes out of a mental institution because of his illness,he meets his teenage daughter Miranda. He tries to convince her that there is Spanish gold buried near by and they get closer while they search for it.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: As Curtis tries to make it as a music manager, he provides a career change for a girls' band that consists of three soul singers. But as he tries to make the band into headliner material, he ends up demoting then firing the lead singer to replace her with another whom he deems more fit for stardom.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A step-father finds himself threatened by fierce competition when his step-children's father, who is way more cool than him, shows up suddenly.

programme.title: Thirteen Days
programme.desc: As the Cold War is at its peak in October 1963, the American administration discovers that the Soviet Union has deployed nuclear missiles in Cuba, prompting US President Kennedy to intervene. As he leads a political struggle with his team to try to do what's necessary to deal with the imminent danger.

programme.title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
programme.desc: The intelligence of mankind has reached an unimaginable level. A private company created a robot in the form of a child called David, which is adopted by a family that almost lost their child because of his illness. A strong bond between David and his mother Monica develops. But all of this soon turned into a handful of complications after Monica's son healed and returned home.

programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguist, Louise Banks, and a theoretical physicist, Ian Donnelly are asked by US Army Colonel Weber to join a team to find out why twelve extraterrestrial spacecrafts have appeared across the Earth. Banks makes contact with two seven-limped aliens and starts to learn their language of complicated circular symbols. As mankind swings on the verge of global war, Banks and the team race against time for answers which if misinterpreted, could threaten the future of humanity.

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: With a skilled jewel thief on the loose, Inspector Clouseau manages to identify the site of his next hit and sets out to try to stop him before he steals the priceless diamond known as "The Pink Panther".

programme.title: She's Funny That Way
programme.desc: A married Broadway director falls for a prostitute-turned-actress and decides to professionally adopt her, while she in turn is having another affair simultaneously with the writer of the play they're working on.

programme.title: The Founder

programme.title: The Post
programme.desc: in 1971, Kay Graham (played by Meryl Streep) inherits ownership of the Washington Post newspaper and tries to find her work-life balance while building her confidence as a woman to lead the company. When military analyst, Daniel Ellsburg, decides to expose the truth about the US government's 20 years of clandestine involvement in the Vietnam war that was hidden from the public, he leaks 1000s of pages of classified reports to reporters at the New York Times. The Post race to compete with the New York Times, as its assistant editor tracks Ellsburg and gets a copy of the same reports, but the court issues a restraining order against further publishing. Kay Graham, with the help of the Post editor in chief, Ben Bradlee (played by Tom Hanks), has to decide whether to fight for the freedom of the press by bringing the truth about the war to the light and risk being charged of treason and the closure of her company, or to remain silent and avoid the wrath of the White House.

programme.title: Love at the Shore
programme.desc: In an attempt to finish her new novel, single mom Jenna decides to seize the chance of their beach vacation to meet her deadline. But fate has a way of interfering with even the best-laid plans, as Jenna comes to find out when her neighbor, the surfer Lucas, proves a detriment to her progress.

programme.title: The Commuter
programme.desc: A former cop's commute takes a dark turn when his wife's life is held as leverage against him identifying a mysterious passenger on the train he is on. With time running out, the stakes have never been so high as he is drawn into a complex conspiracy with a deadly outcome.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic the Hedgehog comes to Earth, he hides in the town of Green Hills, and is helped by the town's Sheriff to escape the evil Dr. Robotnik who's hired by the government to capture him.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: An ice driver leads a high-stakes rescue mission to save trapped miners after a remote diamond mine collapses in far northern Canada.

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: The adventures of Han Solo and Chewbacca before joining the Rebellion and their encounters with the famous gambler Lando Calrissian, in a journey that will set the course of one of the Star Wars saga's most unlikely heroes.

programme.title: Chaos Walking
programme.desc: After a virus kills all the women on New World, the survivors face yet another challenge as their every thought gets turned into visions, overwhelming their senses and driving them to insanity. Among the chaos, Todd finds Viola, a girl who may have a way to silence all the noise.

programme.title: Crawl
programme.desc: When a hurricane strikes her Florida town, Haley ignores the evacuation orders to search for her missing father. After she finds him seriously injured, they become trapped in their house because of a massive flood. They try to escape, but discover that the rising water level is the least of their worries.

programme.title: Train to Busan Presents: Peninsula
programme.desc: Four years after the zombie outbreak in Train to Busan, a soldier and his team are tasked with going to the wastelands of the Korean Peninsula where they have to relive the terrifying horror once again.

programme.title: Truly, Madly, Sweetly
programme.desc: When a sudden inheritance brings them together, Natalie and Eric connect while renovating the historical bakery they inherited in the hope to kickstart a flourishing business. programme.desc: When Gwen's plans to get engaged on her 30th birthday fall through, she makes a wish to be able to see into the future. But instead of offering answers, her glimpse into the future sends her into a tailspin as it raises questions about whether she is with the right man.

programme.title: The Stalker Club
programme.desc: When a group of teens joins the stalker club, their safety is threatened as a teenage girl becomes the target of a masked stalker when she participates in a dangerous game.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: A former gateway driver for a gang is enrolled in Witness Protection. When he gives his guard the slip in order to drive his girlfriend to an interview in LA, their field trip gets more complicated as they are pursued by a former acquaintance and a US Marshall.

programme.title: The Children Act
programme.desc: A renowned High Court Judge deals with a personal crisis just as she has to rule on one of the hardest cases of her life. Her ruling is what determines whether an underage leukemia patient can refuse a life-saving blood transfusion for religious reasons or not.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: The film tells of a suspicious video of some strange scenes, after the viewer sees it, he gets a phone call telling him that he will die after 7 days.

programme.title: The Good Lie
programme.desc: Orphaned by the brutal Civil war in Sudan that began in 1983, these young victims traveled as many as a thousand miles on foot in search of safety. Fifteen years later, a humanitarian effort would bring 3600 lost boys and girls to America.

programme.title: Date with Love
programme.desc: In a bid to raise his popularity at school, David makes a video asking an actress, Alex Allen, to be his date to prom, which soon goes viral. Desperate for some good publicity, Alex accepts the proposal, only to end up falling for David's teacher.

programme.title: The Stalker Club
programme.desc: When a group of teens joins the stalker club, their safety is threatened as a teenage girl becomes the target of a masked stalker when she participates in a dangerous game.

programme.title: Appetite for Love
programme.desc: When Mina's work sends her back to her hometown, she must contend with old feelings as her encounters with her former sweetheart Clay, whom she is trying to convince to sell his restaurant, stir old feelings for her.

programme.title: Unleashing Mr. Darcy
programme.desc: A modern-day Pride and Prejudice that sees Elizabeth Scott clashing with Donovan Darcy at a dog show after his attitude rubs her the wrong way. Despite sharing a mutual attraction, their relationship goes downhill as a series of misunderstandings ensue, until they get a real look at each other.

programme.title: You Again
programme.desc: Marni is a successful businesswoman who returns to her hometown for the marriage of her older brother. She finds that he's about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school. Things get worse when Marni's mother comes face-to-face with the girl's aunt, who was also bothering her in high school.

programme.title: The Convenient Groom
programme.desc: When Kate's fiancé leaves her, she finds herself in a dilemma since their publicized marriage is about to happen, and the issue could threaten her image as a relationship expert. A childhood friend, who harbors a secret crush on her, steps up as a replacement groom to help her save face.

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: Adaline Bowman (Blake Lively) is born in the early 1920s. After an accident, she becomes ageless. She remains 29 years old for eight decades, and after years of isolation, she meets a man who rekindles her passion for life. She spends a weekend with his parents, and finds her secret threatened.

programme.title: Sweet Land
programme.desc: Set in a 1920 small Minnesota village; as a German woman arrives for an arranged marriage to a Norwegian immigrant farmer, the young couple has to deal with the rising hostility towards Germans in the aftermath of WWI.

programme.title: When in Rome
programme.desc: Beth works at the Guggenheim and is very good at her job, so good in fact that one may say that she is perhaps a bit “too good” at it. Love and romance have been forced to take a back seat in her life as she focuses all of her energies on her career. However, all of this changes when she travels to Rome to attend her sister’s wedding and gets to know Nicholas Beamon.

programme.desc: What was supposed to be a lucky purchase for a married couple turns into a nightmare when they discover that their dream house is coveted by an unstable woman who is willing to do anything to force them out.(n)

programme.title: Anything for Love
programme.desc: While setting up their online dating profiles, Kate and Jack's friends encourage them to lie. But when the two are matched, their lies threaten to destroy the connection that they have made.(n)

programme.desc: A struggling single mother fights to keep her small-town diner afloat. Brought down by a series of disappointments and abandonments, she finds a sliver of hope in the form of an old boyfriend, Chase, who is a professional baseball player who comes to his childhood home after a career disappointment.(n)

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: A woman (Cameron Diaz) is enraged when she discovers her boyfriend (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau) is married. She teams up with his wife (Leslie Mann) and another mistress of his (Kate Upton) to plot their revenge.(n)

programme.title: A Separation
programme.desc: A married couple struggle, as Nader wants to stay in Iran to look after his father, who suffers from Alzheimers, while his wife Simin wants to travel abroad with their daughter in hopes of a better life.(n)

programme.title: A Model Kidnapping
programme.desc: When the aspiring model Grace goes to a photoshoot for the fashion photographer Hunter, things take a terrifying turn when she finds herself kidnapped, as she has to find a way to free herself from his clutches.(n)

programme.title: Mr & Mrs. Smith
programme.desc: A married couple going through marriage counseling discover that they are both assassins working for competing agencies when they are charged with killing each other.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: William is a brave squire, whose master dies, and he decides to continue his legacy with his friends, Roland and Watt, by his side. During their journey they meet an aspiring writer, who William convinces to forge a document proving that he's a knight. Thus, his journey as a knight begins, in several different towns.

programme.title: The Man with the Iron Heart
programme.desc: In 1942, during the peak of the third Reich, the Czech Resistance decides to pull one of the most ambitious and adventurous moves of WW2 by sending a group of soldiers in their late 20s to Prague to assassinate the most ruthless Nazi leader Reich-protector Reinhard Heydrich.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: After chasing and hunting down hundreds of criminals, Frank Castle "The Punisher" confronts his strongest and most fierce enemy yet: "Jigsaw.

programme.title: Gotti
programme.desc: A closer look at the crime world of the Gotti family, as John Gotti Jr. is struggling in his relationship with his father on a personal level, as well as taking over the position of his father as head of the Gambino criminal organization that was founded by his father a long time ago.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: A runaway train carrying toxic chemicals must be stopped before it derails and kills everyone in town. Its up to a train conductor and engineer (Denzel Washington and Chris Pine) to stop the train in time.

programme.title: Two Graves
programme.desc: In the wake of her son's murder, a doctor teams up with a drug addict to capture the young man whom she believes is responsible for her recent loss. But as she tries to force a confession out of him through torture, hidden secrets come to the surface as tragedy strikes again.

programme.title: Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile

programme.desc: In an alternate world, a group of extraordinary figures from contemporary fantasies, science fiction, and adventure literature team up to stop a villain who is planning to turn the world's nations against one another.

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
programme.desc: Retired assassin John Wick (Keanu Reeves) unwillingly returns to the criminal underworld to repay a debt, but is faced with many challenges along the way, including a bounty that has been put on his life.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is heading towards Earth, threatening to destroy mankind, NASA sends a team of drillers and geologists, to drill inside the asteroid and blow it from the inside with a warhead.

programme.title: Battle for Incheon: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: The story follows the daring covert operation 'X-ray' where a team of spies is sent by American General Douglas MacArthur to gather intelligence on North Korean defenses before the launch of the Incheon Landing Operation.

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Paul Blart works as a security guard at the New Jersey mall. For many years, Paul was applying to work as a policeman, but he always failed the physical test because of his diabetes. One day, an armed gang robbed the mall, and held hostages inside, including his daughter. Because of Paul's sense of security, he becomes the police's eye inside the mall, and the only one able to stand to them.

Because of Paul's sense of security, he becomes the police's eye inside the mall, and the only one able to stand to them.

programme.desc: When a former cop becomes the superintendent of an upscale building in New York, he is quick to start investigating the mysterious disappearances that take place in the building. Narrowing his suspect pool down to one man, he must race to uncover the truth as his own daughters land in peril.

programme.title: Get Carter
programme.desc: Jack Carter, who left his home in Seattle years ago and moved to Las Vegas, returned to the funeral of his brother Richard after his death in a road accident during a storm. He suspects that he was killed and is after the killers.

programme.title: The Vanishing
programme.desc: On an isolated island off the Scottish coast, three lighthouse keepers come across a trunk loaded with gold, and their paranoia and greed lead them into a battle for survival.

programme.title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film follows the life of Mark Felt, pseudonymized "Deep Throat" who helped journalists uncover the true events of the Watergate scandal of 1974.

programme.title: Austin Found
programme.desc: Fed up with her mundane life, a woman comes up with a scheme to gain publicity, plotting with her ex-boyfriend and an ex-con to kidnap her 11-year-old daughter.

programme.title: Unbreakable
programme.desc: David Dunn is the sole survivor of a horrific train-crash that killed 131 people. An obscure character approaches Dunn as he thinks he has something extraordinary about him.

programme.title: Carrie Pilby
programme.desc: The film is about a young girl named Carrie Pilby (Bel Powley), who's highly intelligent and struggles to find a logic to the world as it relates to morality, relationships, sex, and leaving her apartment.

programme.title: Little Italy
programme.desc: Nikki and Leo find themselves in a difficult predicament when their romance faces an obstacle in the form of their respective fathers' rivalry over their competing pizzeria.

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: When a bank robber takes a kid hostage, an agent and the kid’s father try to take him back before it is too late.

programme.title: Mark Felt: The Man Who Brought Down the White House
programme.desc: Based on true events, the film follows the life of Mark Felt, pseudonymized "Deep Throat" who helped journalists uncover the true events of the Watergate scandal of 1974.

programme.title: Seabiscuit
programme.desc: During the Great Depression era, a general state of despair and despondency prevails, and people have to cope with their tragic losses. A group of three men manages to turn Seabiscuit, a looked-down-upon racehorse, into the most loved sports icon and a national symbol of hope.

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: On the occasion of his fifth wedding anniversary, Nick Dunne reports that his wife, Amy, has gone missing. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble. Soon his lies, deceits and strange behavior have everyone asking the same dark question: Did Nick Dunne kill his wife.

programme.title: Up Close & Personal
programme.desc: An ambitious young woman pursues a career as a TV journalist. With Warren's help and sincere advice, her career flourishes and she becomes the "First Woman Anchor". When she gets a great opportunity and moves on to Philadelphia, Warren decides to follow her.

programme.title: Prometheus
programme.desc: Set in the late 21st century, the film centers on the crew of the spaceship Prometheus as it follows a star map discovered among the artifacts of several ancient Earth cultures. programme.desc: Looking for a fresh start, Sarah takes her son Chris to live in the Irish countryside. When Chris runs into the forest, Sarah becomes terrified that he fell into a mysterious sinkhole. But as Chris returns safe and sound, Sarah starts suspecting that the boy who came back isn't her son.(n)

programme.desc: David Wozniak discovers he has fathered over 500 children through donations to a fertility clinic twenty years ago. He wrestles with the decision to come forward or not when 142 of them file a lawsuit to find out who he is.(n)
